<template>

    <b-navbar-toggle target="user-collapse"></b-navbar-toggle>

    <b-collapse id="user-collapse" is-nav>

          <font-awesome-icon icon="sign-in-alt" class="a-icon" />Ingresar
        </b-nav-item>
      </b-navbar-nav>

  </b-navbar>
</template>

export default {
  name: "NavbarTopDemo",

    return {
      user: "Fabricio"
    };

};
</script>

<style scoped>
.bg-light {

}

}

</style>
